plot: A murder story, a love story and a thriller. In May 2009, Rodrigo Rosenberg, a charismatic lawyer went cycling near his home in Guatemala and was murdered. Nothing unusual there: Guatemala has a murder rate four times higher than Mexico's. What was extraordinary is that Rosenberg knew, for certain, he was about to be killed. There began a brilliant investigation, a journey into Rosenberg's soul and Guatemala's hell, that after multiple twists and turns, reached a stunning revelation... Rosenberg's lover had been murdered a few weeks before. He was driven to investigate things, he told friends, that would inevitably lead to his death. A video he recorded days before he died accused the president of his murder. Uploaded to YouTube, it nearly brought down the government.
title: I Will Be Murdered
